thread.title: Locally owned eatery among nation's 50 best burger joints, report says
thread.title_full: Locally owned eatery among nation's 50 best burger joints, report says

author: Sonya Sorich
title: Locally owned eatery among nation's 50 best burger joints, report says
text: An entree from Skip's Kitchen in Carmichael. You might not have to travel far to find one of the best burgers in America. Skip's Kitchen at 4717 El Camino Ave. in Carmichael is among the nation's top 50 burger joints, according to a new report from Foursquare . The local business is No. 29 on the list, which ranks eateries in order of their Foursquare rating. 4 photos An entree from Skip's Kitchen in Carmichael. The list is based on Foursquare City Guide data, which considers ratings, Foursquare's proprietary hotness score, visit popularity and tip sentiment. Skip's Kitchen has been open for five and a half years, according to owner Skip Wahl. The restaurant's menu includes burgers, sandwiches and salads. The business is also popular on Yelp , with a rating of four and a half stars based on nearly 700 reviews. Sonya Sorich is digital editor at the Sacramento Business Journal. She also oversees social media activity and writes about retailing, small business and restaurants. Industries
